definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to sway/to waver/to rock/to rattle/to destabilize/to pose a challenge to
to change shape in a single shake/fig. to take on a new lease of life
to sway gently (as in the wind)/(of a flame) to flicker
a legendary tree that sheds coins when shaken/a source of easy money (idiom)
to draw the winning ticket (in a lottery)

sentences.english: What makes the candle blow so?
The young American pilot bit his lip, shaking his head.
sentences.chinese: 这个年轻的美国机师咬住了嘴唇，摇了摇头。

sentences.english: Fluttering red smile, only for the drunk.
sentences.chinese: 随风飘摇红尘一笑，只为醉逍遥。

sentences.english: I couldn’t resist rolling down the window. As soon as I did, I heard waves crashing along the shoreline.
sentences.chinese: 我忍不住摇下车窗，立即听到了波涛冲刷海岸的声音。

sentences.english: Worrying is like a rocking chair, it gives you something to do, but it gets you nowhere.
sentences.chinese: 忧虑就像坐在摇椅上，只会原地摇，哪里也到不了。

sentences.english: The dwarf sat down and the elf rang the little brass bell.
sentences.chinese: 侏儒坐下来，而小仙人摇了那小铜铃。

sentences.english: Parents should work together as efficiently as two bookends.
sentences.chinese: 父母亲应合作无间，如同两个书档使书稳立不摇。

sentences.english: Many records have been set by people who love to hula hoop.
sentences.chinese: 热爱摇呼拉圈的人创下了许多纪录。

sentences.english: He carried the newspaper back out to the kitchen and shook the hair clippings into the trash can.
sentences.chinese: 他把报纸回厨房，然后摇了摇头发剪报进了垃圾桶。

sentences.english: The cake dor shakes a naked snake dawn the quaking rake lacking sake.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕制造者无缘无故地用抖动的耙子摇一条赤的蛇。

sentences.english: The officer looked, then shook his head in puzzlement.
sentences.chinese: 那个职员看了看，迷惑的摇了摇头。

sentences.english: Lauren asked a bone-tired volunteer. The man shook his head.
sentences.chinese: 劳伦斯问一个累得筋疲力尽的自愿者，那人摇了摇头。

sentences.english: She shook up the pillows, and then lay down in bed.
sentences.chinese: 她把枕头抖摇膨松后，躺在了床上。

sentences.english: The cake maker all-overs a naked snake with the agitation rake without account.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕制造者平白无故地用抖动的耙子摇一条赤裸的蛇。

definition: to wash/to squander/to sweep away/to move/to shake/dissolute/pond
variant of 燙|烫[tang4]/variant of 趟[tang4]
to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
top (of the head)/apex/to fall forwards/inverted/to jolt
to support with the hand/to help sb up/to support oneself by holding onto something/to help
